titles.title: A resolution to authorize the production of documents by the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/11/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide upon request to law enforcement authorities records of the Subcommittee's investigation of door-to-door sales operations.
